article: the pompey predictions league is very much part of this site now is n't it ? would it be the same without it - i 'm not sure it would to be honest with you . a chance to really prove ourselves , in many ways , against an automatic promotion chasing side came pompey 's way ahead of christmas . however , eventually , despite the heroics of luke mcghee in goal , the blues eventually slipped to defeat at new meadow . over to uspompeyfan with his latest update to the 2017-18 season ... a game which pompey never really looked comfortable in saw shrewsbury start the christmas program with a comfortable 2-0 win .

after briefly maintaining a stalemate and a penalty save , the inevitable happened and pompey succumbed to the better team . pompey 's recent run of form prompted most players to predict a win or draw for the blues , however it was the middle of the pack that prospered today , with blue exile , khodgkins and langston grabbing 5 points and uspf achieving the only maximum . the girls still lead it at the top as the wiggy family duels uspf family in the top 4 slots , while the two dad ` s lie 3rd and 4th .

steaming is in 5th spot . let 's see what pompey can do against the wombles on boxing dayhave a great christmas everyone and play up pompey . if you want to see the table via the forum thread click here . keep on keeping on guys . anyone can enter at any time remember . just because you missed out on predicting for the game against the shrews it 's by no means too late so join in now , for the first time perhaps in the next league one game . this comes at fratton park against wimbledon this afternoon .

as we 're always keen to make it as easy for you as possible - as we want plenty to get involved - the forum link for your prediction to be made for this game is below ... along with the remainder of the month . wimbledon tuesday 26th december 2017 - click here . play up pompeyfollow @vitalportsmouth . 2017-18 prediction league - decemberwimbledon tuesday 26th december 2017 - click here . northampton saturday 30th december 2017 - click here .
